capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out that he's a guy. I mean, it's pretty clear-cut, you know? He's definitely a male.

So, I've been thinking about Dudley and his gender. It's interesting to note that he identifies as male, but I'm not sure if that's a choice or just how he's always felt. Anyway, it makes sense that he would want to be recognized as male, right?
